name: Confess My Love
description: The story takes place after school, when Willie decides to confess his love to the girl of his dreams, Liza. Afraid of being refused, he hesitated for a while. Should he summon up his courage and confess his love to her?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ Vista/7/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 1.06Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 50 MB available space
